roleset.name: get violently
roleset.note: WREST-V NOTES: Member of Vncls steal-10.5. (from wrest.01-v)

example.name: passivized
example.text: Former Democratic fund-raiser Thomas M. Gaubert, [whose savings and loan]-1 *trace*-1 was wrested *trace*-1 from his control by federal thrift regulators, has been granted court permission to sue the regulators.

example.name: fairly normal
example.text: After Mr. Ackerman announced [he]-1 was soliciting consents from shareholders in order *trace*-1 to wrest control of Datapoint from Mr. Edelman, the corporate raider purchased 30% of Datapoint's shares.

example.name: awkward syntax
example.text: Analysts expect the new computer to wrest a hefty slice of business away from IBM, the longtime leader in mainframes.
example.arg: away from IBM, the longtime leader in mainframes
